item.description:
Join us out on the deck for dinner at the Summer Shanty overlooking the Bass River Marina.

Located at Bass River Marina, The Summer Shanty is the Cape's coolest waterfront bar and restaurant. This casual eatery is open seasonally for lunch and dinner.

The menu features littlenecks and oysters, Dan's crazy lobster rolls, steamers, scallops, salmon, swordfish, clam chowder & more! Take out & boat service is available.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at the Summer Shanty Restaurant
